Structs/SlackMessage/ResponseType.html#/.name: inChannel
Structs/SlackMessage/ResponseType.html#/.abstract: Display the message to all users in the channel where a message button was clicked.

Structs/SlackMessage/ResponseType.html#/.name: ephemeral
Structs/SlackMessage/ResponseType.html#/.abstract: Display the message only to the user who clicked a message button.

Structs/SlackMessage.html#/s:21PerfectSl.name: deleteOriginal
Structs/SlackMessage.html#/s:21PerfectSl.abstract: Used only when creating messages in response to a button action invocation.

Structs/SlackMessage.html#/s:21PerfectSl.name: messageBuilderPreviewURL

Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html#/s:21.name: title
Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html#/s:21.abstract: Shown as a bold heading above the value text.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html#/s:21.name: value
Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html#/s:21.abstract: The text value of the field. It may contain standard message markup

Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html#/s:21.name: short
Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html#/s:21.abstract: An optional flag indicating whether the value is short enough

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.name: text
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.abstract: A short, user-facing string to label this option to users.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.name: value
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.abstract: A short string that identifies this particular option to your application.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.name: description
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.abstract: A user-facing string that provides more details about this option. Also should contain up to 30 characters.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.name: title
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.abstract: Title the pop up window. Please be brief.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.name: text
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.abstract: Describe in detail the consequences of the action and contextualize your button text choices.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.name: okText
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.abstract: The text label for the button to continue with an action. Keep it short. Defaults to Okay.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.name: dismissText
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.abstract: The text label for the button to cancel the action. Keep it short. Defaults to Cancel.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: name
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Provide a string to give this specific action a name.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: text
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: The user-facing label for the message button or menu representing this action.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: type
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Provide button when this action is a message button or provide select when the action is a message menu.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: value
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Provide a string identifying this specific action.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: confirm
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: If you provide the confirmation fields, your button or menu will pop up a dialog

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: style
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Used only with message buttons, this decorates buttons with extra visual importance,

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: options
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Used only with message menus. The individual options to appear in this menu,

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: optionGroups
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Used only with message menus. An alternate, semi-hierarchal way to list available options.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: dataSource
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Accepts static, users, channels, conversations, or external.

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: selectedOptions
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: The selected option’s value field is contextual based on menu type and is always required:

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.name: minQueryLength
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action.html#/s:2.abstract: Only applies when data_source is set to external. If present, Slack will wait till the specified

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.name: Confirmation
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Confirmat.abstract: Protect users from destructive actions or particularly distinguished decisions

Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.name: Option
Structs/SlackAttachment/Action/Option.ht.abstract: An option field. Used in static and external message menu data types.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: title
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Provide this attachment with a visual header by providing a short string here.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: titleLinkURL
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: By passing a valid URL in the title_link parameter (optional), the title text will be hyperlinked.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: preText
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: This is optional text that appears above the message attachment block.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: text
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: This is the main text in a message attachment, and can contain standard message markup.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: authorName
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Small text used to display the author’s name.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: authorLinkURL
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: A valid URL that will hyperlink the author_name text mentioned above.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: authorIconURL
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: A valid URL that displays a small 16x16px image to the left of the author_name text.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: imageURL
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: A valid URL to an image file that will be displayed inside a message attachment.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: thumbnailURL
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: A valid URL to an image file that will be displayed as a thumbnail

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: color
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Used to visually distinguish an attachment from other messages.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: actions
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: A collection of actions (buttons or menus) to include in the attachment.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: fields
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Fields will be displayed in a table inside the message attachment.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: callbackId
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: The provided string will act as a unique identifier for the collection of buttons within the attachment.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: fallback
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: A plaintext message displayed to users using an interface that does not support attachments or interactive messages.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: type
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Even for message menus, remains the default value default.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: footer
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Add some brief text to help contextualize and identify an attachment.

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: footerIconURL
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: To render a small icon beside your footer text, provide a publicly accessible URL string

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.name: timestamp
Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Does your attachment relate to something happening at a specific time?

Structs/SlackAttachment.html#/s:21Perfec.abstract: Default initializer

Structs/SlackAttachment/Field.html.abstract: Fields will be displayed in a table inside the message attachment.
